field.SQLQuery: select DISTINCT id,file from conf_file ORDER BY id
field.Label: Config id (int):

field.SQLQuery: select id, CONCAT(ip, ' v',CAST(build_ver AS CHAR)) AS 'IPO' from ipo ORDER BY id
field.Label: IPO id (int):
Select date
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select date Start
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select date End
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT datetime_started FROM results ORDER BY datetime_started

field.Label: Select test status
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM results ORDER BY status

field.Label: Select build
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT run_nr FROM `results` ORDER BY run_nr

report.SQLQuery: SELECT * FROM results ORDER BY id
SELECT CONCAT('Run ',CAST(run_nr AS CHAR)) AS Run_Number,COUNT(status) AS 'Success rate (%)' FROM results WHERE status = 'PASS' GROUP BY run_nr
report.SQLTotal: SELECT CONCAT('Run ',CAST(run_nr AS CHAR)) AS Run_Number,COUNT(status) AS 'Success rate (%)' FROM results GROUP BY run_nr

report.SQLQuery: SELECT CONCAT('Run ',CAST(run_nr AS CHAR)) AS Run_Number,COUNT(status) AS 'Nr of tests' FROM results GROUP BY run_nr
